titlepage.titleproper: A Guide to the Virginia Counselors Association records, 1930-1997
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
the Library of Virginia 30684
titlepage.author: Trenton Hizer

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Virginia Counselors Association records, 1930-1997. Accession 30684. Organization records collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of the Virginia Counselors Association

bioghist.head: Historical Information
bioghist.p: Founded in Richmond, Virginia, in 1930, the organization is the state branch of the American Personnel and Guidance Association, whose national headquarters are in Falls Church, Virginia. The organization was called the Virginia Association of Guidance and Personnel Workers up to 1956, and then became the Virginia Personnel and Guidance Association. In 1981, the organization changed its name to the Virginia Counselors Association. Organized to lobby the state legislature and to promote the continued elevation of the status of the counseling profession and the professional development of its members.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Records, 1930-1997, of the Virginia Counselors Association concerning the organization, goals, and operations of the organization and containing agendas; annual, board, and executive meeting minutes; chapter and committee reports; correspondence; histories; membership lists; newsletters; resolutions; and miscellaneous subject files. There is also information relating to the Virginia Elementary School Guidance and Counseling Act of 1979, as well as tapes of radio public service announcements produced by the Stratford chapter.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged into the following series:

list.item: Series III: Annual Conferences and Meetings, 1932-1996.
Series VII: Lists and Directories of Officers and Members, 1930-1994.
Series VIII: Elementary School Guidance and Counseling Act of 1979, 1976-1981.
Series IX: Gertrude D. Lewis files.

scopecontent.p: Administrative files include articles of incorporation and related papers, constitution and by-laws, organizational handbooks and guidelines, policies, and an organization history from 1930 to 1969.

did.unittitle: Articles of incorporation and related materials, 1970, 1976.
History of the Virginia Personnel and Guidance Association 1930-1969, 1970.

scopecontent.p: Committee/Board Meeting minutes, 1933-1934, 1948-1997, contain the minutes of the Executive Committee and the Board of Directors meetings, and related papers.

did.unittitle: Executive Board and Board of Directors meeting minutes, 1974.
Board of Directors and Executive Committee meeting minutes, 1975-1976.
Executive Committee and Board of Directors meeting minutes, 1977-1978.
Board of Directors meeting minutes, 1979-1981 (for 19 September meeting, see next folder).
Board of Directors meeting minutes, 19 September 1980.
Board of Directors and Executive Committee meeting minutes, 1981-1984.
Board of Directors and Executive Board meeting minutes, 1985-1986.
Board of Directors and Executive Committee meeting minutes, April-May 1989.
Executive Committee and Board of Directors meeting minutes, July-October 1989.
Board of Directors and Executive Committee meeting minutes, November 1989-1990.
Board of Directors and Executive Committee meeting minutes, 1993.
Board of Directors and Executive Committee meeting minutes, 1994.
Board of Directors and Executive Committee meeting minutes, 1996.
Board of Directors and Executive Committee meeting minutes, 1997.
Series III: Annual Conferences and Meetings, 1932-1996.

scopecontent.p: Annual Conferences, Conventions, and Meetings, 1932-1996, contain articles, brochures, correspondence, minutes, programs, registration forms, reports, speeches, surveys, and other papers relating to annual meetings, conferences, and conventions.

Reports, 1932-1994, contain the reports of chapters, committees, divisions, and treasurers of the organization detailing its operations and goals. Papers also include budgets, by-laws, correspondence, minutes, and resolutions.

did.unittitle: Chapter annual reports, minutes, and correspondence, 1949-1950, 1958-1963, 1965-1966, 1968, 1972-1976.
Chapter annual reports, minutes, and correspondence, 1976-1979.
Division annual reports, by-laws, and correspondence, 1970-1979.
Report and recommendations for Action Retrenchment Advisory Committee, 1982.

scopecontent.p: Secretary's files, 1983-1996, include agendas, brochures, budgets, calendars, correspondence, directories, handbooks, journals, lists, manuals, minutes, newsletters, notebooks, photographs, plans, programs, reports, and schedules.

did.unittitle: State Special Education Advisory Report, May 1990.
Secretary's notebook--calendar and Board of Directors membership list, 1995-1996.
Membership directory and brochures, 1991, no date.

scopecontent.p: Correspondence, 1942-1987, contains correspondence to and from the Virginia Counselors Association (Virginia Personnel and Guidance Association) concerning the goals and operations of the organization. Papers include correspondence from its parent organization, the American Personnel and Guidance Association, and a note from Lyndon B. Johnson (1908-1973).

did.unittitle: american Personnel and Guidance Association correspondence and memoranda, 1956-1972.
Series VII: Lists and Directories of Officers and Members, 1930-1994.

scopecontent.p: Lists and Directories of Officers and Members, 1930-1994, contain membership rosters, lists of officers, and organization and member directories.

did.unittitle: Series VIII: Elementary School Guidance and Counseling Act of 1979, 1976-1981.

scopecontent.p: Elementary School Guidance and Counseling Act of 1979, 1976-1981, contains articles, awards, budgets, bulletins, correspondence, labels, legislation, lists, plans, programs, statements, surveys, and other papers concerning the Elementary School Guidance and Counseling Act of 1979.

did.unittitle: ACES (Association for Counselor Education) and ASCA (American School Counselor Association) joint statement on elementary school counselor, .
APGA program at Las Vegas, Nevada, 2-5 April 1979.
Survey forms and original covering letter, 1980.
Letters responding to proposal for legislation, 1978-1980.
Budgets and plans of action, mission statement for elementary guidance, 1978-1979.

Report from Borwn and Cook to APGA and ASCA, 18 July 1978.
Birth of a Bill--first draft, correspondence, etc., 1978-1979.
Copies of bulletins to the nation and copies of form letter to those offering help, 1978-1980.
Article published in The School Psychologist, 1979.
Letter of approval to Dr. Riehm and letters to state department personnel and to local supervisor of guidance, 1978-1979.
Letters from Pat Hooper, J. Thompson, Billie Jackson, 1979-1981.
Letters received and answered--general information and statements made Augusta County project, 1977-1981.

APGA Distinguished Legislative Service Award for Jeanette Brown and John R. Cook, 1979.

Series IX: Gertrude D. Lewis files.

scopecontent.p: Gertrude D. Lewis files contain papers of Gertrude D. Lewis (1916-2000) of Culpeper, Virginia, who worked as a high school guidance counselor supervisor for the state department of education. Papers are related to the projects, organizations, and other matters with which she was involved.

did.unittitle: CACO (Clusters Approach to Career Orientation) project, 1975-1978.
Career Development--NVGA position paper and ACES position paper, 1975-1978.
Senior survey and ninth grade survey, 1976-1977.

scopecontent.p: Publications, 1948-1994, includes the newsletters of the Virginia Personnel and Guidance Association and the Virginia Counselors Association, including the titles The Relator and The Virginia Counselor; VPGA and VCA journals; organization brochures; other publications; and newspaper clippings.

Miscellaneous files contain papers relating to VPGA and VCA goals and operations, including committees, workshops, awards, public relations and other subjects. Also contain publications, directories, and papers of other organizations that the VCA often worked with or had the same interests. Also contain the VPGA seal and the VPGA career service award plaque.

did.unittitle: Implementing ethical standards: development of a model program for state branches of APGA,1981.
A Guide for public relations personnel, 1979.
The counselor and the law workshop, 1970.
Virginia Association for Non-white Concerns in Personnel and Guidance of the Virginia Counselors Association, 1981.
Richmond Personnel and Guidance Association minutes, 17 February 1972.
The Accrediting Commission for Business Schools: Directory of Accredited Institutions and Operating Criteria, 1966-1967.
American Association for Counseling and Development papers, 1988, 1991.
American School Counselors Association professional recognition award for John R. Cook, 1979 (folder 1 of 2).
American School Counselors Association professional recognition award for John R. Cook, 1979 (folder 2 of 2).
The Bookmen's Association of Virginia directory, 1962-1963.
House of Representatives The Working Congress,1976.
Juvenile Delinquency Prevention Program, Division of Youth Services--Virginia Department of Corrections Prevention Profiles,.
State Board of Vocational Education: Vocational Education in Virginia,.
Virginia Association for Counselor Education and Supervision certificate, 7 April 1971.
Address to Virginia Association of Vocational Guidance, 23 October 1952.
Virginia Elementary School Counselors Association papers, 1979-1980.
Virginia Mental Health Counselors Association conference, 15 July 1983.
Virginia School Mental Health Coalition papers, 1992.
Virginia State Advisory Council on Vocational Education: 14th annual evaluation report, 1983.
Virginia State Board of Education guidance newsletter, 1952, 1956, 1965-1966.

scopecontent.p: Audio tapes, 1981-1982, contain copies of four different public service announcements concerning counselors. PSAs were made by the Stratford chapter of the VPGA/VCA. A digital copy of these recordings was made in January 2015, and a CD-R containing all four was added to Box 20.
